==Trivia==
* On YouTube and Spotify, the soundtrack includes a credit for the singer Xiaoyun Huang ({{zh|黄霄雲}}), who does not appear in the full credits on Chinese music platforms. It is likely that HOYO-MiX accidentally put the name in the soundtrack's metadata, as Huang was credited in some works for ''Honkai Impact 3rd'' and ''Honkai: Star Rail''.
